description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2024/02705/FUL dated 20th January 2025 for the "Deconversion of the existing property from 2no. self-contained flats into a single family dwellinghouse; erection of single storey rear extension, following the demolition of existing conservatory; alterations to fenestration to the rear conservatory extension at upper ground floor level to include, erection of a new pitched roof to replace existing, installation of new aluminium framed French doors with fixed panes and a wrought iron Juliette balcony following the removal of existing glazing to the rear elevation; installation of an enlarged rooflight in the front and rear roofslopes, following the removal of existing; installation of new double glazed windows to replace existing windows throughout; installation of a new window to the side elevation at second floor level; infilling 1no. window, and installation of an enlarged window to replace existing, to the side elevation at first floor level; re-sizing and replacement of an existing window, and formation of a bin store to the existing plant room, to the side elevation at lower ground floor level." Amendments sought to widen the door and lower the lip at its entrance to facilitate its use as a bin store, and retaining original sash windows to the side elevation at ground , first and second floor level, installation of bi-parting doors and a lean-to glazed roof instead of approved French doors and rooflights to the rear elevation at upper ground floor level, installation of new triple-glazed windows to replace existing windows throughout.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
